conversation.content: I'm looking to stay at a 3 star hotel in the north.
Sorry, I have no results for that query. Would you like to try a different area of town?

Yes I have two. Would you like me to book one?
I need a hotel to include free parking; does either have that?
Yes both of them have free parking.
Is the Ashley hotel a 3 star hotel?
the ashley is actually a 2 star hotel.
Does this hotel have rooms with a good view of the neighborhood?
Yes, the Ashley Hotel has very nice views that are described as exquisite. Would you like to book a room there?
